metadata.title: RESURRECTION
description: This is the best of the melodic metal that penetrates the past era of the new GALNERYUS era where the Japanese world is proud of the world, and the ultra-clear high tone vocalist Masatoi Ono. A metal album of the crying of this century! The long-awaited work is based on the direction of their signature 2nd and Masoshi Ono, and has released a compelling melody flooding that is not only suitable for Japanese Raku Metal fans, but also J-ROCK and J-POP fans. The song "A FAR-OFF DISTANCE" is a Japanese television anime that combines dark and positive aspects. The ending theme of "RAINBOW" (April to September 2010)
